titleStmt.title: The Ecclesiasticall discipline of the reformed churches in France, or, The order whereby they are governed faithfully transcribed into English out of a French copy.
Discipline des églises reformées de France. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. P. for Nicholas Bourne ...,

notesStmt.note: A translation of La discipline des eglises reformees de France, ou, L'ordre par lequel elles sont conduites et gouvernees.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
